org.openwms.core

Interface GenericEntityService<T extends AbstractEntity,ID extends Serializable,BK extends Serializable>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGenericEntityService

    public interface GenericEntityService<T extends AbstractEntity,ID extends Serializable,BK extends Serializable>
    A GenericEntityService provides some common used CRUD operations available for most entity types.
    Since:
    0.2
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Heiko Scherrer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T create(T entity)
      Create and persist a new entity.
      List<T> findAll()
      Find and return all entities.
      T findByBK(BK key)
      Return an entity identified by it's unique business key.
      T findById(ID id)
      Find and return an entity identified by it's unique technical id .
      void remove(T entity)
      Remove an entity.
      void removeByBK(BK[] keys)
      Remove entities identified by their unique business key.
      void removeByID(ID[] keys)
      Remove entities identified by their unique technical key.
      T save(T entity)
      Save the given entity or persist it, in case it is a transient one.
      Collection<T> saveAll(Collection<T> entities)
      Save an collection of entities.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        T create(T entity)
        Create and persist a new entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - The new entity to create
        Returns:
        The newly created and persisted entity

      • findByBK

        T findByBK(BK key)
        Return an entity identified by it's unique business key.
        Parameters:
        key - The business key to identify the entity
        Returns:
        The entity

      • findAll

        List<T> findAll()
        Find and return all entities.
        Returns:
        A list of all entities

      • findById

        T findById(ID id)
        Find and return an entity identified by it's unique technical id .
        Parameters:
        id - The unique technical identifier of the entity
        Returns:
        The entity

      • save

        T save(T entity)
        Save the given entity or persist it, in case it is a transient one.
        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to save
        Returns:
        Saved entity instance

      • saveAll

        Collection<T> saveAll(Collection<T> entities)
        Save an collection of entities. No matter if they already exist or not.
        Parameters:
        entities - An collection of entities to save
        Returns:
        A collection of all passed entities containing updated ones as well as not updated ones.

      • remove

        void remove(T entity)
        Remove an entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to remove

      • removeByBK

        void removeByBK(BK[] keys)
        Remove entities identified by their unique business key.
        Parameters:
        keys - The unique business keys of the entities to remove

      • removeByID

        void removeByID(ID[] keys)
        Remove entities identified by their unique technical key.
        Parameters:
        keys - The unique technical keys of the entities to remove
